devdoc.author: @neuro_0x
devdoc.details: A contract for locking Uniswap V2 liquidity pool tokens for specified periods.

getLockedTokenAtIndex(uint256).details: Get the address of a locked token at an index.

getNumLockedTokens().details: Get the total number of locked tokens

getNumLocksForToken(address).details: Get the number of locks for a specific token.

params._lpToken: The address of the LP token.

getUserLockForTokenAtIndex(address,addre.details: Get the lock for a specific user and token at an index.

params._lpToken: The address of the LP token.

getUserLockedTokenAtIndex(address,uint25.details: Get the token address a user has locked at an index.

getUserNumLockedTokens(address).details: Get the number of tokens a user has locked.

getUserNumLocksForToken(address,address).details: Get the number of locks for a specific user and token.

params._lpToken: The address of the LP token.

incrementLock(address,uint256,uint256,ui.details: increase the amount of tokens per a specific lock, this is preferable to creating a new lock, less fees, and faster loading on our live block explorer

params.amountOfLPToLock: amount of LP tokens to lock
params.unlockDate: the unix timestamp (in seconds) until unlock
params.withdrawer: the user who can withdraw liquidity once the lock expires

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

relock(address,uint256,uint256,uint256).details: extend a lock with a new unlock date, _index and _lockID ensure the correct lock is changed this prevents errors when a user performs multiple tx per block possibly with varying gas prices

params._index: the index of the lock for the token
params._lockID: the lockID of the lock for the token
params._unlockDate: the new unix timestamp (in seconds) until unlock

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setMigrator(address).details: Set the migrator contract which allows locked lp tokens to be migrated to uniswap v3

params._migrator: The address of the migrator contract

transferLockOwnership(address,uint256,ui.details: transfer a lock to a new owner, e.g. presale project -> project owner

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(address,uint256,uint256,uint256.details: withdraw a specified amount from a lock. _index and _lockID ensure the correct lock is changed this prevents errors when a user performs multiple tx per block possibly with varying gas prices

devdoc.title: LiquidityLocker
